hero.title: About NovaArab
hero.subtitle: We are a team of innovators, developers, and strategists dedicated to building the future of technology in the Arab world and beyond.

founder.name: Hassan
founder.title: CEO at NovaArab
founder.bio1: As Founder and CEO of NovaArab, I lead a clear vision: empowering businesses in the Arab world through innovative and advanced technical solutions.
founder.bio2: We believe digital transformation is not just a luxury, but a strategic necessity. Through our dedicated team and commitment to excellence, we help our clients achieve their digital goals.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between traditional business and modern technology, NovaArab has grown to become a key technology partner for companies in the region.
story.p2: We believe in the power of digital transformation to solve complex problems and create new opportunities. Our journey is defined by a relentless pursuit of excellence and commitment to client success.

values.title: What Drives Us
values.subtitle: Our mission, vision, and values guide everything we do

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with innovative tech solutions that drive sustainable growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage in the digital age.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading technology partner in the Middle East, globally recognized for quality, integrity, and transformative digital solutions.

core.title: Our Values
core.description: Customer focus, technical excellence, transparency, continuous learning, and ethical practices define who we are and guide every decision.

passion.title: Passion Drives Us
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every line of code and every client interaction.

excellence.title: Tech Excellence
excellence.description: We stay at the forefront of technology, constantly learning and adapting to new tools and methodologies.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We challenge the status quo and seek creative solutions to complex problems.

quality.title: Quality Obsession
quality.description: We take pride in delivering work that exceeds expectations and stands the test of time.

timeline.title: Our Path
timeline.subtitle: Milestones that shaped who we are today

y2019.title: Company Founded
y2019.desc: NovaArab founded with a mission to bridge the tech gap in the Middle East.

y2020.title: First Major Project
y2020.desc: Delivered our first enterprise solution, setting our standard for quality and innovation.

y2021.title: Team Expansion
y2021.desc: Team grew to over 20 specialists covering all aspects of modern software development.

y2022.title: International Recognition
y2022.desc: Received industry awards and established partnerships with global tech leaders.

y2023.title: AI Integration
y2023.desc: Launched AI & ML division, helping clients leverage cutting-edge technology.

y2024.title: Continued Growth
y2024.desc: 500+ successful projects, expanding services and maintaining 98% client satisfaction.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies & Success Projects
caseStudies.subtitle: We take pride in delivering innovative tech solutions to our partners. Explore how we transformed ambitious ideas into tangible digital reality using cutting-edge technologies.

ecommerce.title: Smart E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Development of an integrated e-commerce platform supported by AI to deliver personalized recommendations and a seamless user experience, resulting in a 40% increase in sales.

erp.title: Enterprise Resource Management (ERP)
erp.description: Comprehensive cloud solution for managing internal operations of large companies, linking HR, sales, and accounting in a unified dashboard.

logistics.title: Logistics & Shipment Tracking App
logistics.description: Smart app for real-time shipment tracking using geolocation technologies, with algorithms to optimize delivery routes.

education.title: Interactive Digital Education Portal
education.description: Educational platform supporting live virtual classrooms and interactive content, designed to accommodate over 100,000 concurrent students.

banking.title: Banking Cybersecurity System
banking.description: Development of an advanced protection layer for banking infrastructure, relying on machine learning to proactively detect threats and cyber attacks.

finance.title: AI Financial Analysis Platform
finance.description: Advanced tool for financial analysts enabling large data processing and extracting market predictions with high accuracy and speed.

aiSolutions.title: AI Solutions for Enterprises
aiSolutions.subtitle: We empower enterprises to harness the power of AI to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and create exceptional customer experiences. From simple automation to complex models, we are your partner in the intelligent transformation journey.
aiSolutions.customDescription: We have a team of AI engineers ready to build your custom model.
aiSolutions.ctaTitle: Ready to Take Your Business to the Future?
aiSolutions.ctaDescription: Book a free consultation with our experts to discuss how AI can serve your goals.

chatbots.title: Intelligent Chatbot Systems
chatbots.description: Advanced chatbots powered by LLaMA and GPT models to provide instant, intelligent customer support around the clock, with high capability to understand local dialects.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis & Prediction
dataAnalysis.description: Advanced algorithms to transform big data into actionable insights, helping make strategic decisions based on accurate facts.

contentGen.title: Creative Content Generation
contentGen.description: Smart tools to create high-quality marketing texts, images, and videos, designed to match your brand identity and attract your target audience.

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendation Systems
recommendations.description: Smart recommendation engines that suggest suitable products and content for each user based on their preferences and past behavior, increasing conversion rates.

vision.title: Computer Vision
vision.description: Solutions capable of analyzing images and videos for facial recognition, quality inspection, and security monitoring with high accuracy and automatically.

aiDocs.title: AI Systems Documentation
aiDocs.subtitle: Welcome to the NovaArab AI documentation. This platform provides a comprehensive set of tools and APIs that enable you to easily integrate advanced AI capabilities into your applications and projects.

intro.speedDesc: Ultra-fast responses powered by global CDN.
intro.securityDesc: Full data encryption compliant with SOC2 standards.

api.description: All our APIs are based on HTTP REST protocol and support JSON format in requests and responses. You must include your API key in the Authorization header.

setup.description: You can customize model parameters to control creativity and response length. These settings are optional but useful for optimizing results.
setup.temperature: Controls randomness. Higher values make output more diverse.
setup.maxTokens: Maximum number of tokens to be generated.
setup.topP: Alternative to Temperature, limits to highest probability tokens.

debug.description: If you encounter errors, the API will return a standard JSON error object containing the error code and descriptive message.
debug.securityWarning: Never share your API keys in client-side code or public repositories.

caseStudyDetail.notFoundDesc: Sorry, we could not find the requested case study.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing packages designed to match your project scope and business goals. No hidden fees, just transparent value.
pricing.ctaDescription: Choose a plan that fits your needs or contact us for a custom enterprise solution.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small businesses and startups looking to establish their digital presence.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Ideal for growing companies that need advanced features and scalability.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Comprehensive solutions for large organizations with complex requirements.

upgrade.q: Can I upgrade to another plan later?
upgrade.a: Absolutely! You can start with any plan and upgrade as your needs grow. We make the transition seamless.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and can accommodate custom payment terms for enterprise clients.

refund.a: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the initial deliverables, we'll work with you until you are.

custom.a: Yes! The Enterprise plan is fully customizable. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements and get a custom quote.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question or ready to start your project? We're here to help you bring your vision to life.
contact.description: Whether you're looking to build a new product, improve your existing systems, or need specialized consulting, we're ready to help you succeed.
